name: dir-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for working with OASF agent records. Provides tools and prompts for validating, searching, pushing, pulling, importing, and exporting OASF agent records to/from Directory servers.

data.name: dir-mcp-server
data.description: MCP server for Directory operations with OASF agent records. Provides comprehensive tooling for schema validation, record management, and format conversion.

env_vars.name: OASF_API_VALIDATION_SCHEMA_URL
env_vars.description: OASF schema URL for validation and schema operations (required)

env_vars.name: DIRECTORY_CLIENT_AUTH_MODE
env_vars.description: Authentication mode: none, x509, jwt, token, github

env_vars.name: DIRECTORY_CLIENT_SPIFFE_TOKEN
env_vars.description: Path to SPIFFE token file (for token authentication)

env_vars.name: DIRECTORY_CLIENT_GITHUB_TOKEN
env_vars.description: GitHub Personal Access Token (for GitHub authentication)

env_vars.name: DIRECTORY_CLIENT_TLS_SKIP_VERIFY
env_vars.description: Skip TLS verification (set to true if needed)

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_list_versions
tools.description: Lists all available OASF schema versions supported by the server.

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_get_schema
tools.description: Retrieves the complete OASF schema JSON content for the specified version.

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_get_schema_skills
tools.description: Retrieves skills from the OASF schema with hierarchical navigation support.

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_get_schema_domains
tools.description: Retrieves domains from the OASF schema with hierarchical navigation support.

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_validate_record
tools.description: Validates an OASF agent record against the OASF schema.

tools.name: agntcy_dir_push_record
tools.description: Pushes an OASF agent record to a Directory server.

tools.name: agntcy_dir_search_local
tools.description: Searches for agent records on the local directory node using structured query filters.

tools.name: agntcy_dir_pull_record
tools.description: Pulls an OASF agent record from the local Directory node by its CID (Content Identifier).

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_import_record
tools.description: Imports data from other formats (MCP, A2A) to OASF agent record format.

tools.name: agntcy_oasf_export_record
tools.description: Exports an OASF agent record to other formats (A2A, GitHub Copilot).

prompts.name: create_record
prompts.description: Analyzes the current directory codebase and automatically creates a complete OASF agent record.

prompts.name: validate_record
prompts.description: Validates an existing OASF agent record against the schema.

prompts.name: push_record
prompts.description: Complete workflow for validating and pushing an OASF record to the Directory server.

prompts.name: search_records
prompts.description: Guided workflow for searching agent records using free-text queries. Automatically translates natural language queries into structured search parameters using OASF schema knowledge. Examples: "find Python agents", "agents that can process images".

prompts.name: pull_record
prompts.description: Guided workflow for pulling an OASF agent record from Directory by its CID. Optionally saves the result to a file.

prompts.name: import_record
prompts.description: Complete workflow for importing data from other formats to OASF with enrichment and validation. This guided workflow includes: format conversion using the OASF SDK translator, domain and skill enrichment using OASF schema, comprehensive validation, and optional output to file.

prompts.name: export_record
prompts.description: Complete workflow for validating and exporting an OASF record to other formats. This guided workflow includes: OASF record validation, schema compatibility check, format conversion using the OASF SDK translator, export verification, and optional output to file.
